speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0034/2007 ) by Mr Voggenhuber, on behalf of the Committee on Civil Liberties, Justice and Home Affairs, on compliance with the Charter of Fundamental Rights in the Commission’s legislative proposals: methodology for systematic and rigorous monitoring ( 2005/2169(INI) ).
